sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Top v-if="!auth.check() && route.fullPath !== '/login' && route.fullPath !== '/register'" />
  <TopLogged v-if="auth.check()" />

  <Error v-if="error" />
  <suspense v-if="!error">
    <router-view :key="route.fullPath"></router-view>
    <template #fallback>
      <Loading />
    </template>
  </suspense>

</template>
<script setup>
  import { useRoute } from "vue-router/dist/vue-router";
  import { Auth } from "@/store/auth";
  import { onErrorCaptured, onUnmounted, ref } from "vue";
  import Error from "@/components/Suspense/Error";
  import { watch } from "fs";
  const auth = Auth();
  const error = ref(false);

  const route = useRoute()

  onErrorCaptured((e) => {
    error.value = true;
  });

  watch(
      () => route,
      updateError => {
        error.value = false
      }
  )
</script>
